bill_title: affect the premiums for persons with guarantee issue health plans.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to affect the premiums for persons with guarantee issue health plans. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 58-17 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any carrier of an in force individual health benefit plan issued in accordance with § 58-17- 85 prior to August 1, 2003, for which rates are established pursuant to § 58-17-75, who set and charged a premium rate increase as authorized by § 58-17-142, shall report that premium rate increase to the division. Only that portion of any premium rate increase attributable to the enactment of § 58-17-142 may be included in the report required by this section. The reported amount shall be credited to the carrier pursuant to section 2 of this Act. No carrier may charge the reported amount to the insured. Section 2. The amount reported by a carrier in section 1 of this Act shall be allowed as a credit for that carrier on the premium tax imposed by chapter 10-44. Section 3. This Act is repealed June 30, 2006. 300 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.029 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
